content:
The invoice is sent to the email you used to create the order, once your package is shipped. 

Please check your spam folder to see if the email with the invoice ended up there.

If you were not able to obtain your invoice with these suggestions, please submit a ticket here.

We are sorry, but customs duties or related taxes are not paid by us. 

It is mentioned in our e-shop when you're confirming the conditions (otherwise the order could not be created):

"I understand that I am responsible for paying customs duties, local taxes, and other related fees, if applicable." 

If you refuse to pay the customs and related taxes, the package will be sent back to us. Once it is returned, we can:

1) Resend the package, but you will need to pay the shipping cost again

2) Refund the price of your order minus the shipping costs

If you want to refuse the package even after the information above, please let us know via the form in the following step.

connections.title: I refuse to accept the order

content: Unfortunately, since we're subject to the EU law and we do have an ongoing official contract with DHL, UPS and the Czech Post, we're obligated to print out the full price on the package.
What document do you require?

Customs duties and taxes are always calculated based on the local laws of the destination country. Unfortunately, we are unable to keep track of all the rules and laws for every country. Please contact your local authorities in order to get an estimated customs fee.

For your information, the product will be shipped from the European Union as a USB device with HS code 847180. The total declared value for the customs department is the full price of the order, including shipping.

The KYC documents are not submitted by us. As the name suggests, they need to be processed by the customer.

Here you can find what KYC documents are. 

We recommend contacting the respective courier that is handling the delivery process for your parcel to coordinate the procedure directly with you.
If you need to contact our support, please submit your ticket here.
Please provide more details about your problem.
metadata: payment, paid, btc, bitcoin, credit, card

connections.title: I’ve paid, but my order was canceled
I don’t understand how to pay

content: The promo code needs to be entered into the “I have a promo code” section as described below before you pay for your order.

connections.title: Next
connections.description: If you see the message “Sorry, the provided promo code does not exist.” after trying to apply the promo code, then please click on "Next" to read the possible explanations.

content:
When an invalid VAT ID is entered, you will see in the e-shop interface that it was not accepted by our system.

It is possible that our system didn’t reflect a valid VAT ID (it could be too new or there could be a different problem in the database). 

You can check the validity of your VAT ID here. If your VAT ID is not registered (listed) here, we can't accept it in our e-shop.

If you’re sure that you’ve entered a correct (valid) VAT ID and it is registered in the European database, please submit a ticket here.

A usable promo code must fulfill these criteria:

1) The promo code needs to still be active - We release promo codes during some specific dates or events, always available for a limited period of time or number of uses. This detailed information is presented on our blog or in the newsletter.

Please subscribe to our newsletter through our form that is located at the bottom of our website, and check out our blog to stay on top of the news!

2) The promo code needs to be valid - Only our own released promo codes can be used. 

Unfortunately, we cannot apply the discount retroactively.

We believe the device is worth every penny of its original price, so you don't need to feel bad about buying it for a full price as proven by many satisfied customers
Please select the payment method you used for your order.

This situation can happen only with Bitcoin payments.

In case you have some doubts whether your payment was sufficient, please verify the status of your order first. 

If your order has “Paid” status, then everything is fine and your order will be processed.

The status of your order can be found via your e-shop account.
metadata: insufficient, incorrect, little, lower, not enough

connections.title: Next
connections.description: If your order has a different status than “Paid”, then please continue to the next step.

content: Please follow these instructions.

text: Bitcoin payment issue - verifying the payment
content:
Please verify whether your Bitcoin transaction was already confirmed on the blockchain.

We recommend using one of the blockchain browsers where you need to type the destination address provided by our e-shop when paying with Bitcoin.

Suggested blockchain explorers: 

https://blockchain.info/

https://btc-explorer.trezor.io/

connections.title: Next
connections.description: If your transaction is confirmed and the order has still not been paid, then please continue to another suggestion by clicking on "Next".

text: Credit card issue - verifying the order
content:
You may have created multiple orders by accident. Please check whether the cancellation notification is related to a different order that was not paid for. 

You can see all your orders when you log in to your e-shop account (or accounts if you created more orders under different emails) with this link.

If the suggestions above didn’t resolve the issue, please submit your ticket here.

text: Bitcoin payment issue - verifying the order
content:
You may have created multiple orders by accident. Please check whether the cancellation notification is related to a different order that was not paid for. 

You can see all your orders when you log in to your e-shop account (or accounts if you created more orders under different emails) with this link.

If the suggestions above didn’t resolve the situation, please submit your ticket here.

Two scenarios can happen:

1) Your order has status “Waiting for the payment”.

In this case, your payment has still not been processed and confirmed by the blockchain.

You can verify the transaction.

We recommend using one of the blockchain browsers where you need to type the destination address provided by our e-shop (shop.trezor.io) when paying with Bitcoin.

Suggested blockchain explorers: 

https://blockchain.info/

https://btc-explorer.trezor.io/

2) Your order has status “Canceled”.

In this case, the payment was insufficient and the order was canceled after 7 days.

If your order has been processed and confirmed by the network or has canceled status please continue to the contact form.

We are planning to add more payment options, but there is currently no estimated time of availability.

As soon as a new payment method is ready, you will see it as a new option in our e-shop (shop.trezor.io) and it will also be publicly announced on our social media (twitter, reddit).

Please subscribe to our newsletter through our form that is located at the bottom of our website, and check out our blog to stay on top of the news!

You can also check our Trezor Official shop on Amazon to see whether it better suits your needs.

We are planning to add more shipping methods (couriers), but there is currently no estimated time of availability.

As soon as a new shipping method is available, you will see it as a new option in our e-shop and it will be also publicly announced on our social media (twitter, reddit).

Please subscribe to our newsletter through our form that is located at the bottom of our website, and check out our blog to stay on top of the news.

Please be aware that currently only standard shipping is available for Russia because of problems with customs.

You can also check our Trezor Official shop on Amazon to see whether it better suits your needs.

If your country is missing from the shipping list on the official e-shop, you can contact our support to evaluate whether your country is reachable by our shipping methods and is possible to add.

Countries experiencing war or conflict an countries under the sanction list cannot be added.

text: Other issues related to the e-shop interface
content:
If our e-shop website is not available at all (connection timeout/server down), we are working as fast as possible to fix this issue.

Only to make sure that something important is not overlooked, please:

1. Check your internet connection with another website

2. Try a different browser

3. Try to visit our website in incognito/private mode

You can also check whether our servers are operational by using this link.

If you need to contact our support, please submit your ticket here.
If you need to contact our support, please submit your ticket here.

text: Restoring the password to your e-shop account
content:
We suggest verifying whether you created more e-shop accounts under different emails.

Restoring the password

To restore your password, please use this link and click on the “Recover your password” button located on this website.

In the next step you’ll need to enter an email address where the instructions for setting a new password will be sent and then hit the “Reset my password” button.

If you didn’t receive the email with the instructions, please check your spam folder and whether you entered your email address correctly.
If you need to contact our support, please submit your ticket here.

All unpaid orders are automatically canceled after 7 days, so there is no need to contact our support if you didn’t pay yet.

Paid orders are processed within 48 hours during business days, if not stated otherwise by a notification when creating your order (ie. backorder or another special situation related to the status of our stock).

It is possible to cancel the order only if it is in "New" status. You can check the status by logging in to your e-shop account. 

All messages that are not related to the request for the cancellation will be automatically deleted.

connections.title: The order I want to cancel has “new” status
The order I want to cancel was already shipped or processed

content:
If you have not paid for your order yet, there is no need to contact support, since all unpaid orders are automatically canceled after 7 days. You can create a new order to fit your needs. 

Paid orders are processed within 48 hours during business days, if not stated otherwise by a notification when creating your order (ie. backorder or another special situation related to the status of our stock).

It is possible to change the order only if it is in "New" status. You can check the status by logging in to your e-shop account.

All messages unrelated to the request form will be put on low priority, and might cause a delay in response time or even be deleted.

connections.title: The order I want to change has been paid and has “new” status
The order I want to change was already shipped or processed

content: Please specify your current situation. Has the order already been delivered to you?

If your order has not been paid yet, there is no need to contact support, since all unpaid orders are automatically canceled after 7 days. Therefore you can, without worries, create another order that would fit your needs. 

Paid orders are processed within 48 hours during business days, if not stated otherwise by a notification when creating your order (ie. backorder or another special situation related to the status of our stock).

It is possible to postpone the order only if it is in "new" status. You can check the status by logging in to your e-shop account.

All messages unrelated to the specific form will be put on low priority and might cause a delay in response time or even be deleted!!!

If you want to postpone your order, please submit a ticket here.
If you fulfill the criteria, please contact our Support Team to file your request.
If you fulfill the criteria, please contact our Support Team to file your request.

Please bear in mind that refunds for returned orders can be claimed only when all necessary conditions have been fulfilled, and you will not receive a full refund.

Orders can be returned for refund only within 15 days from the day your package was received. More details can be found here.

1. If the Trezor box is not open, we will refund the cost of the Trezor product(s) once it has returned to us, minus the shipping costs you paid for this order to be both sent to you and returned to us. 

2. If the Trezor box is open, we will refund the cost of the Trezor product(s) minus 18 EUR for each unit (because of testing, refurbishing, and repacking the product) and minus the shipping cost you paid for this order once it has returned. You are also responsible for the shipping cost of sending the returned product(s) back to us.

If you ordered more products in one parcel, you can also return only a part of the order.

For example, from an order with two Trezor One White, you may return only one Trezor One White if you decide you don't want two. 

In case you paid with Bitcoin, please also read the conditions for Bitcoin refunds.

If you fulfill the necessary conditions and still want to return your order, please submit a ticket here.

text: The order has still not been delivered
content:
Before you decide to refuse the package, please read the conditions and possible outcomes below.

Refund conditions can be found here. 

If you’ve decided to refuse your order, please wait until delivery messenger (courier service) notifies you that your parcel is ready to be delivered, and then kindly ask them to return the parcel to the sender.

Once the parcel is returned to us, we will start the refund procedure and contact you.

You can notify us about your decision by continuing to the contact form. It may speed up the whole process.
Please forward us more details regarding your issue.

The tracking portal shows “Tracking not found”

What status do you see?

connections.title: Next
connections.description: Please click "Next" to continue.

content:
Standard shipping is only available in EU countries and Russia. Its traceability is limited. 

Delivery time may vary from 5 days to 6 weeks depending on your location and your national postal service. 

Parcels sent via Standard shipping can be traced here until it leaves the country of origin. It can be traced on the website of the postal service in your country, if available.

Please read this information describing the conditions to start the investigation process with the Czech post and how long it may take.

If your order fulfills one of the presented conditions, please submit a ticket to start the investigation procedure.

DHL shipping is a professional and fast delivery service. Your order is fully traceable and this information is available for up to 90 days from when the package was handed to the DHL courier. 

Delivery time may vary between 2 and 5 business days (it may be delayed by the customs procedure).

1) Please verify the status of your parcel via the DHL tracking portal.

Parcels sent via DHL shipping can be traced here.  

2) If your parcel was not delivered within the stated time frame, please contact your local DHL directly. 

If our suggestions didn’t help to resolve the situation, please submit a ticket here.

UPS shipping is a professional and fast delivery service that is currently available for the following countries: UK, CZ, SK, PL and DE. 

Your order is fully traceable and this information is available for up to 120 days from when the package was handed to the UPS courier. 

Delivery time may vary between 1 and 3 business days.

1) Please verify the status of your parcel via the UPS tracking portal.

Parcels sent via UPS shipping can be traced here (https://www.ups.com/tracking/tracking.html) 

2) If your parcel was not delivered within the stated time frame, please contact your local UPS directly.

If our suggestions didn’t help to resolve the situation, please submit a ticket here.

text: Delivery delay Czech post issue form

content:
Paid orders are processed within 48 hours during business days, if not stated otherwise by a notification when creating your order (ie. backorder or another special situation).

Orders with standard shipping are processed every Monday and Thursday, therefore purchases with this shipping method are the most prone to delays. 

We are working to process your order as soon as possible, but if the status is still not set to “Shipped” two business days after it was paid, please submit a ticket here.

The tracking ID is available only after your order has been shipped. 

Paid orders are processed within 48 hours during business days, if not stated otherwise by a notification when creating your order (ie. backorder or another special situation related to the status of our stock)

Once the order is shipped you will receive a notification e-mail from no-reply@trezor.io, and then you can see the tracking ID in your e-shop account.

connections.title: Next
connections.description: If you want to know how to use the tracking ID to check the status of your order, please continue.

content:
This situation has several explanations.

1. You’re entering an incorrect tracking ID

2. Your order was not entered in the tracking database of the respective service yet

If you chose standard shipping for your order, the package may have left the Czech Republic, and is now untraceable until the destination country's postal service claims it.

After leaving the country of origin, the parcel travels to a foreign country where it is accepted at customs services. This is where most delays happen. The delivery will appear in the customer's post tracking system only after it is released by customs.

connections.title: I think my order was delayed
I want more details about the tracking

content:
You can receive three types of tracking IDs according to the shipping method you’ve chosen for your order.

Types of tracking IDs

Standard shipping: 13 characters (combination ID [letters and numbers] that starts with RR and ends with CZ)

DHL shipping: 1234567890 (ten digit ID)

UPS shipping: 18 characters (combination ID [letters and numbers] that always starts with 1Z)

Tracking portals

For DHL

For UPS

For Standard shipping

Orders sent via Standard shipping can be traced here until it leaves the country of origin. It can then be traced on the website of the postal service in your country, if available.

connections.title: Send us a message
connections.description: If the situation is not clarified, please continue.

content:
1. Please contact the courier service or local post that handled the delivery for an explanation for why your package is damaged.

We would suggest taking photos of your package that will clearly document its status. 

2. Sometimes the package is opened by customs. Unfortunately, we can't do anything to prevent customs from doing so as it is within their legal powers.

Customs usually labels such packages with the information that it was opened by them. When contacting the courier service or local post, they should also be able to inform you whether this happened.

connections.title: Parcel is too damaged, I want to return it
I want to keep the parcel, is it safe?

content:
If your package was opened, it is highly possible that it was done by customs. Unfortunately, we can't do anything to prevent customs from doing so, as it is within their legal powers.

Customs usually labels such packages with the information that it was opened by them. When contacting the courier service or local post, they should also be able to tell you whether this happened.

If you want to know how your Trezor device is protected against tampering, please select an appropriate model.
If you want to return the parcel, please submit a ticket here.
If you want to know how your Trezor device is protected against tampering, please select an appropriate model.

Packaging/device protection levels

The Trezor box is protected by holographic seals and it is also virtually impossible to open the box and device itself without breaking it (the case is sealed using ultrasound), so you would see right away if someone had tampered with it.

Software protection levels

All Trezor devices are distributed without a firmware software, so you need to install it for your first use. If there is a firmware installed already, then that means someone used this device before you.

The bootloader verifies the firmware signature. The device only runs if the firmware is correctly signed by SatoshiLabs.

Our Bootloader software is write protected, as the JTAG is disabled. MCU is safeguarded by the Memory Protection Unit., that ensures you're using a valid firmware version signed by us. If not, then there is a warning message on the Trezor display.

More details can be found via these links:

Tamper Evident Hologram

Trezor Packaging Timeline

Blog Article About Packaging

If you’re still worried about the security of your device, please submit a ticket here.

Device protection levels

USB-C port of Trezor Model T is protected by a holographic seal, and it is virtually impossible to open the device itself without breaking it (the case is sealed using ultrasound), so you would see right away if someone had tampered with it.

Software protection levels

All Trezor devices are distributed without a firmware software, so you need to install it for your first use. If there is a firmware installed already, then that means that someone used this device before you. 

The bootloader verifies the firmware signature. The device only runs if the firmware is correctly signed by SatoshiLabs.

Our Bootloader software is write protected, as the JTAG is disabled. MCU is safeguarded by the Memory Protection Unit., that ensures you're using a valid firmware version signed by us. If not, then there is a warning message on the Trezor display.

More details can be found via these links:

Tamper Evident Hologram

If you’re still worried about the security of your device, please submit a ticket here.
If your order is 'On Hold' then there's something wrong with your order. Check your email to see if the Support Team has messaged you.

connections.title: Order is 'On Hold' and I want to know why.
